p.d: Cédric is in his thirties and still lives with his parents. During a family meal he learns his sister is expecting a baby. While everyone else is delighted at this news, it triggers a deep resentment in him. The time has come to settle family scores... Directed by: Antoine Cuypers (Belgium/Luxembourg/Netherlands, 2015) Cast: Nathalie Baye (the mother), Arno Hintjens (Alain), Thomas Blanchard (Cédric), Ariane Labed (Caroline), Éric Caravaca (Gaëtan), Cathy Min-Jung (Cyrielle), Arthur Blois (Nathan), Julien Baumgartner (Laurent) Genre: drama Awards: Public Prize (Angers 2016), official selection (FIFF Namur 2015, Magritte 2016)
